--- DateTime: 2018/4/16 20:09
---
local ToolUtils = {}

local errors = require(".errors")
local lang = require(".language.zh")

function ToolUtils.error(err_code)
    -- dump(errors)
    local err_str = errors.str(err_code)
    if err_str then
        return lang.errors[err_str]
    end
    return "unknown error."
end

return ToolUtils
